original_text: Solomon began to build the Lord's temple 480 years after the Israelites had left Egypt. It was in the fourth year that he had ruled Israel as king. He started the work in the month called Ziv, the second month of the year. Kings 5 Kings 7
korean_text: 이스라엘 자손이 애굽 땅에서 나온 지 사백팔십 년이요 솔로몬이 이스라엘 왕이 된 지 사 년 시브월 곧 둘째 달에 솔로몬이 여호와를 위하여 성전 건축하기를 시작하였더라

sentences.original_text: Solomon began to build the Lord's temple
480 years after the Israelites had left Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 자손이 애굽에서 나온 지 480년 후였습니다

sentences.original_text: It was in the fourth year
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이스라엘을 다스린 지 네째 해였습니다

sentences.original_text: that he had ruled Israel as king
the second month of the year
